---
title: "oci_provided_aws_ecr.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for an OCI (Open Container Initiative) repository, specifically for AWS ECR (Elastic Container Registry). It specifies the repository details, authentication method, and polling interval for bundle updates.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block that defines the storage settings for the application.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the storage type to "oci"
- Configures OCI-specific settings under the `oci` key

### `storage.oci`
#### Description
Configures the OCI storage settings, including repository information, bundles directory, authentication, and polling interval.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the target repository
- Sets the local directory for storing bundles
- Configures authentication for AWS ECR
- Defines the interval for polling updates

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "oci" | Specifies the storage type as OCI |
| storage.oci.repository | string | "some.target/repository/abundle:latest" | The target OCI repository URL |
| storage.oci.bundles_directory | string | "/tmp/bundles" | Local directory path for storing bundles |
| storage.oci.authentication.type | string | "aws-ecr" | Authentication type for accessing the repository |
| storage.oci.poll_interval | duration | "5m" | Interval for polling updates from the repository |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| AWS ECR | Used for authenticating and accessing the OCI repository |

This configuration file sets up an OCI storage system that uses AWS ECR for authentication. It specifies a repository URL, a local directory for storing bundles, and a polling interval of 5 minutes for checking updates. The authentication type is set to "aws-ecr", indicating that AWS ECR credentials will be used to access the repository.
